data.name: Hidden Shapes Animals - VR
data.detailed_description:
ALSO RECOMMENDED FOR YOU:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1921390/Build_Lands/


ALSO RECOMMENDED FOR YOU:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1629600/Hidden_Shapes_Lovely_Cats__Jigsaw_Puzzle_Game/


ALSO RECOMMENDED FOR YOU:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1683000/Geometric_Sniper__Z


About the Game




An immersive experience made for you to rescue your tranquility, be inspired, relax and have fun!

With the help of VR, we've perfected the immersion and relaxation experience of the first game!

Enter a world where stress will be left out! In an immersive and relaxing environment, forget about your worries by enchanting yourself and solving the puzzles and take the opportunity to observe the power of life in nature!

So that you can have fun and enjoy the game more, after solving the 20 puzzles, the complete art of each one of them will be released, so at any time you can have fun again by solving the entire puzzle.

Be amazed by the minimalist style and the beautiful art of this game, immerse yourself in this world where stress will be left out!

data.short_description: Tired after a hard day at work? Now, with the help of VR, you will delve deep into an environment exclusively prepared for you to have fun and rescue your tranquility, surprising yourself with each solved puzzle!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Bulgarian*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Korean*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Finnish*, Greek*, Dutch*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese*, Romanian*, Russian*, Swedish*, Thai*, Czech*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Arabic*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0 GHz 64 bits Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Oculus - Quest 2
